Pre-Call Prep: Review welcome deck; Send calendar invites
Must-Ask Questions: Who are all stakeholders? What's the target go-live? Any special requirements?
Common Pitfalls: Not getting all stakeholders identified early

Must-Ask Questions: How many permission groups needed? Who needs admin access?
Common Pitfalls: Too many admins; Not creating training group

Pre-Call Prep: Gather location list; Review transaction volumes
Must-Ask Questions: How many phases? Which locations first? Training approach?

Pre-Call Prep: Compile vendor list; Gather sample documents
Must-Ask Questions: Which vendors are critical? Custom doc needs?
Common Pitfalls: Missing key vendors; Underestimating doc needs

Pre-Call Prep: Logo files ready; Bank info gathered
Must-Ask Questions: Any JV relationships? All bank accounts ready?
Common Pitfalls: Missing JV setup; Wrong logo specs

Must-Ask Questions: Bank United or other? Timeline for SFTP?
Common Pitfalls: SFTP delays; Not starting early enough

Must-Ask Questions: What systems need integration? Dev resources available?

Pre-Call Prep: Logo files; Order number decision; Signatory list
Must-Ask Questions: Same order numbers across locations? Duplicate threshold? Authorized signatories?
Common Pitfalls: Different numbers lock files; Low duplicate threshold; Missing payee labels

Must-Ask Questions: Default settings per transaction? Earnest money handling?

Pre-Call Prep: Custom docs ready; QR code needs identified
Must-Ask Questions: Document packages needed? Permissions by role?
Understanding of Connect value prop? User types?
Who is POC? Intro letter customization needed?
Common Pitfalls: Wrong POC selection affects all comms

Must-Ask Questions: Which automatic requests? Custom questions needed?
Common Pitfalls: Too many automatic requests spam clients

Must-Ask Questions: Auto-accept criteria? Scheduling preferences?
Which docs need e-sign? Fillable forms needed?
Rollout plan? Training for partners?
Any remaining concerns? Ready for testing?
Task assignment strategy? Smart roles needed?
Which workflows first? Assignment methods?
Which automations needed? Payoff/HOA actions?
Edge cases? Error handling?
Naming convention? How many templates?
Which vendors to test? Products needed?
Auto-order rules? Performance metrics?
Round robin? Percentage split? Default terms?
Simplifile? Shipping? SSO needed?
Auto-clearing rules? Positive pay?
Risk tolerance? EMD collection method?
Who can send wires? Notification preferences?
Bank portal access? Release process?
Which aggregates needed? ARD setup?
Which reports critical? Subscriptions needed?
JV reporting? Custom fields needed?
UAT scenarios? Issue tracking?
Train-the-trainer? Schedule confirmed?
Support plan? Issue escalation?
RON needed? 1099 setup? Next phases?
Handoff ready? Documentation complete?
